functions.name: ContextMenu
functions.description: Re-export of Radix Context Menu root primitive.

functions.name: ContextMenuContent
functions.description: Styled wrapper around Radix ContextMenu.Content rendered in a Portal with consistent styling and animations.

functions.name: ContextMenuItem / Checkbox / Radio
functions.signature: const ContextMenuItem = React.forwardRef(...); const ContextMenuCheckboxItem = React.forwardRef(...); const ContextMenuRadioItem = React.forwardRef(...)
functions.description: Item wrappers providing styling, optional inset alignment, and item indicators (Check/Circle).

functions.name: ContextMenuSubTrigger / ContextMenuSubContent
functions.signature: const ContextMenuSubTrigger = React.forwardRef(...); const ContextMenuSubContent = React.forwardRef(...)
functions.description: Helpers for nested submenus matching dropdown-menu analogues.

functions.name: ContextMenuLabel / ContextMenuSeparator / ContextMenuShortcut
functions.signature: const ContextMenuLabel = React.forwardRef(...); const ContextMenuSeparator = React.forwardRef(...); const ContextMenuShortcut = (...) => JSX.Element
functions.description: Presentational helpers used within context menus.

notes: Mirrors the DropdownMenu implementations but for context menus; centralizes styling and behavior.
